src_text: Tindzaba Letibalulekile Talelive1.

src_text: Kukhula kwekutselelana ngesifo se-Corona (i-COVID-19) Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka kakhulu mayelana nekukhula kwelinani lelisha lekutseleleka nge-COVID-19 Empumalanga Kapa nakuletincenye teNshonalanga Kap Lokukhula kwekutselelana kubangwe, kuletinye tintfo, kungalandzeli timiso tekutivikela nemitsetfomgomo yeSicwayiso Sesigaba Sekucal Ikhabhinethi itivumile letindlela tekungenelela letihlongotwa nguMasipali Welidolobhakati iNelson Mandela (i-NMB) kute kuliwe nalokukhula kwekutselelana nge-COVID-19.
trg_text: Increase in Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) infections Cabinet has expressed extreme concern about the spike in the number of new COVID-19 infections in the Eastern Cape and parts of the Western Cap The rise in infections has been attributed to, among other factors, non-adherence to COVID-19 prevention protocols and Alert Level 1 regulation Cabinet approved the proposed intervention measures for the Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB) Metropolitan Municipality to address increasing COVID-19 infection Cabinet also approved that the initiation schools may proceed within the strict health protocols outside of the NMB Metr The Minister of Health, Dr Zweli Mkhize, will be undertaking visits to the Western Cape to assess what needs to be done to intervene in areas such as the Garden Rout

src_text: Ikhabhinethi futsi ivumile kutsi tikolo tekusoka tingachubeka ngaphansi kwetimiso leticinile tetemphilo ngaphandle kwelidolobhakati i-NM Indvuna Yetemphilo, Dk Zweli Mkhize, utawuvakashela iNshonalanga Kapa kute ahlole kutsi yini lekufanele yentiwe kute angenelele etindzaweni letifana neGarden Rout Ikhabhinethi iyaphindza futsi kutsi kubalulekile kulandzela kungenelela lokungafaki imitsi lokufana nekugeza tandla ngemanti nangensipho noma ngekusebentisa sibulali magciwane lesentiwe nge-alkhoholi, kugcina kuneligeba ketekuhlalisana nekufaka sifonyo uma usemangwen Sonkhe kufuneka sisekele lolubito Lwenhlangano Yetemphilo Yemhlaba kuvikela kutseleleka kabusha nge-COVID-14.
trg_text: Cabinet reiterated the importance of adhering to non-pharmaceutical interventions such as washing hands with water and soap or using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser, maintaining social distancing and wearing a mask in publi All of us should support the call by the World Health Organisation to prevent new COVID-19 infection As we approach the festive season, we should remember that the pandemic is still active and dangerou Therefore, we must avoid unnecessary travel, particularly by public transport, and limit frequenting public venues such as restaurants, taverns or bar Each of us needs to ensure we take precautions to avoid spreading the virus to our families, especially our elder

src_text: Njengoba sesiya esikhatsini semaholide, kufuneka sikhumbule kutsi lobhubhane usasekhona futsi uyingot Ngako-ke, kufuneka sigweme kuhamba kungenasidzingo, sigweme kakhulu kusebentisa tigitjelwa temmango, futsi sinciphise kuya etindzaweni temmango letifana netindzawo tekudlela, emathaveni noma emabhar Ngamunye ngamunye wetfu kufuneka sicinisekise kutsi siyanakekela kute sigweme kusabalalisa leligciwane emindenini yetfu, kakhulu kulabadzal Kufuneka sihlale silandzela kuhlalisana ngekuchelelana nanoma sihlangenele kubungata emaholide siminden Ngekutiphatsa kahle kwetfu, sonkhe singafaka sandla ekulweni nekuvimba kusabalala kwe-COVID-19.
trg_text: Safer holidays As South Africans take time to enjoy the holidays with their families and friends, Cabinet encourages all of us to do so responsibl In addition to adhering to all health protocols to prevent the spread of COVID-19, we must also abide by the rules of the road to ensure that we all reach our destinations safel

src_text: Ikhabhinethi futsi ivumile kwelula Lesimo Savelonkhe Senhlekelele siye ku-15 Bhimbidvwane 202 Imboni yetigitjelwa temitfwalo
trg_text: The AU will host the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Extraordinary Summit on 5 and 6 December 2020, in preparation for the start of the AfCFTA on 1 January 2021.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakugceka kakhulu lokuphulwa kwemtsetfo lokutsintsa imboni yemtfwalo wemgwaco futsi iyakuncoma lokuphendvula masinyane kwemaphoyisa ngekubopha labasolwa eGauten Ikhabhinethi indlulisa kudvudvuta imindeni nebalingani bebashayeli labalahlekelwe timphilo tabo futsi ifisela labo labalimele kutsi baphole masinyan Nanoma sikuvisisa kukhungatseka kwekuphulwa kwemtsetfo wekungena kulelive lokwentiwa nguletinye tinkapani, ludlame alusiso sisombulul Ikhabhinethi icela bonkhe bantfu labatsintsekako kutsi batfumele tikhalo tabo letimayelana nalemboni yemtfwalo wemgwaco kutinhlangano letifanele kunekutsi bakhetse kuba neludlam
trg_text: Cabinet also approved the extension of the National State of Disaster to 15 January 202 Freight transport industry Cabinet strongly condemned the lawlessness affecting the road freight industry and commended the swift response by the police in arresting suspects in Gauten Cabinet offered its condolences to the families and colleagues of drivers who lost their lives and wish those injured a speedy recover While we understand the frustrations at the violation of immigration laws by some companies, violence is not the solutio Cabinet calls on all affected people to submit their concerns about the freight transport industry to relevant structures instead of resorting to violenc Employment and Labour Minister Thulas Nxesi is leading a team of Ministers that is dealing with this matter and is expected to submit a concrete proposal to Cabinet to address all disputes affecting the industr 3.

src_text: Indvuna Yetemisebenti Netekucashwa Thulas Nxesi uhola litsimba Letindvuna lelisebenta ngalendzaba futsi kulindzeleke kutsi aletse tiphakamiso letiphatsekako kuKhabhinethi kute kuliwe nako konkhe kuphikisana lokukhungetse lemboni Kutfutfukisa sakhiwonchantiIkhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokunikwa kweluHlelo Lekuphakela Emanti Ngebunyenti LaseMshwathi KwaZulu-Natali, lolutawugucula ngalokuphelele timphilo temakhaya langetulu kwala-3 000 etindzaweni tase-Albert Falls, eMpolweni, eTrustfeed naseNadLoluhlelo landvulela leminye imiklamo lehlukene yesigodzi yekuphakela emanti ngebunyenti latawufinyelela kubomasipala besigodzi labasikhombisa
trg_text: Infrastructure development Cabinet welcomed the handover of the uMshwathi Bulk Water Supply Scheme in KwaZulu-Natal, which will completely change the lives of more than 3 000 households in the areas of Albert Falls, Mpolweni, Trustfeed and Nad The scheme is a precursor to various other regional bulk water supply projects that will span across seven district municipalities

src_text: iZululand, iKing Cetshwayo, iLembe, uThukela, Umgungundlovu neHarry Gwal Ikhabhinethi icele labazuzi kutsi bawonge emanti futsi bawasebentise kahle kute kuzuze onkhe emakhay 4.
trg_text: Zululand, King Cetshwayo, iLembe, uThukela, uMgungundlovu and Harry Gwal Cabinet urges the beneficiaries to conserve and use water sparingly for the benefit of all household 4.

src_text: Emaholide lanakuphepha lokukhulu Njengoba bantfu BaseNingizimu Afrika batsatsa sikhatsi sekutijabulisa ngalamaholide nemindeni yabo nebangani babo, Ikhabhinethi iyasigcugcutela sonkhe kutsi sente loko ngekucophelel Kwengeta kulokulandzela timiso tetemphilo tekuvikela kusabalala kwe-COVID-19, kufuneka futsi silandzele imitsetfo yemgwaco kute sicinisekise kutsi sonkhe sifika siphephile lapho siyakhon Kuphepha emgwaceni ngumsebenti wabo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika futsi bonkhe labahamba ngetimoto bayacelwa kutsi balandzele lizinga lesivinini lelimkhawulo lobekiwe emgwaceni, bangashayeli banatsa, futsi bangashayeli ngekunganaki nangebudlabh Batali nalabanakekela bantfwana bayacelwa kutsi bangalisusi liso ebantfwaneni ngalesikhatsi semaholid Ngekunakekela ngekubambisana, singacinisekisa kutsi sitawuba nesikhatsi semaholide lesiphephile nalesimnandz Tincumo teKhabhinethi 1.
trg_text: This contributes to the Sustainable Development Goals, by recognising that the Antarctic and Southern Ocean are critical parts of the global climate syste The strategy contributes to climate action and ecological integrity by promoting the establishment of specially protected and managed area It was published in March 2020 for public commen Human Rights, Liberation and Reconciliation: Nelson Mandela Legacy Sites Nomination Dossier 1 Cabinet approved submission of the Human Rights, Liberation and Reconciliation: Nelson Mandela Legacy Sites Nomination Dossier to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation s World Heritage Centre for consideration and inscription as a World Heritage Sit This is part of the broader Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route Projec 1 The nomination puts forward 10 individual sites in four provinces and seven municipalitie These represent our history of liberation and human rights, and provides evidence of the different phases of the struggle for freedo 1 This nomination is aligned to the National Development Plan, which emphasises the conservation and restoration of protected area It also recognises the potential of the creative economy s contribution towards generating employment and export earning Bills 1.

trg_text: Cabinet appreciated the progress and implored the Department of Public Enterprises (DPE) to hasten the implementation of key initiatives to ensure the emergence of a new restructured, efficient and techno-savvy national airlin

trg_text: Progress has been made in restoring community and labour peace, financial controls, consequence management and service deliver There has also been a turnaround in audit results, and an end to six years of decline and stagnation of audit finding

trg_text: The DPE was directed to finalise the appointment of the interim board for SAA and to conclude the appointment of the Strategic Equity Partner for the restructured SA Mango was commended on the strategic role it played as an SAA subsidiary, to ensure the continued presence of the airline in the marke 3.

trg_text: Cabinet approved the draft OSBP Policy for public consultatio The creation of the OSBP seeks to harmonise the movement of people and goods between South Africa s land ports of entry and its neighbouring countrie The proposals in the policy seek to address congestion which results in delays, particularly by cross-border travellers and trader

src_text: I-Mango iyabongwa kakhulu ngalomsebenti lewentile njengenhlangano lengaphasi kwe-SAA, kucinisekisa kutsi ihlala ikhona nekusebenta kwetindiza kuyachubek 3.
trg_text: The policy proposes the creation of an independent structure to process the land allocations and provides for an online application system to ensure full transparency to the allocation of the lan 7.

src_text: Luhlelo (lalokungahle kuvele) Lwavelonkhe Lwekulungela Sikhatsi Sasehlobo Semnyaka we-2020-21 Ikhabhinethi ilivumile loluhlelo (lalokungahle kuvele) Lwavelonkhe Lwekulungela Sikhatsi Sasehlobo Semnyaka we-2020-21 lolwetfulwe Yindvuna Yelitiko Lekubusa Ngekubambisana Neletindzaba Tendzabuko, Dk Nkosazana Dlamini Zum Loluhlelo lulandzela kucombela lokukhombe kutsi kulindzeleke kutsi kube nematfuba lamakhulu emvula lengetulu kwalokulindzelekile etindzaweni letinengi taleliv Loku kusho kutsi tindzawo letitfola imvula ehlobo letifaka tonkhe tifundza letisiphohlongo
trg_text: National Seasonal Preparedness (Contingency) Plan for the 2020-21 Summer Season Cabinet approved the National Seasonal Preparedness Plan for the 2020-2021 Summer Season presented by the Minister of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs, Dr Nkosazana Dlamini Zum The plan follows predictions which indicated that increased chances of above-normal rainfall over most parts of the country are expecte This implies that the summer rainfall areas covering all eight provinces

src_text: Uma kusetjentiswa loluhlelo, tindlela tekungenelela tichaziwe kute kuncishiswe lomtselela wetingoti letinkhulu tasehlob Loluhlelo lufaka sikhatsi semaholide lesicala kusuka ngeLweti 2020 kuyofika kuNdlovana 2021, ngoba lesikhatsi lesi sivamise kuba nebungoti lobukhulu lobuhambelana netingoti tesimo selitul Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yakunaka kutsi letinye tincenye tetifundza taseKapa tisabukene nesomiso lesikhul
trg_text: In implementing the plan, mitigating measures are put in place to reduce the impact of extreme summer seasonal hazard This plan incorporates the festive season starting from November 2020 to February 2021, since this period prone to increased risks of weather-related hazard Cabinet further noted that some parts of the Cape provinces are still experiencing severe drough Cabinet calls on the public to make the necessary preparations against summer seasonal hazards and ensure effective responses that would save lives, protect property and infrastructur 4.

trg_text: It prioritises the allocation of land ownership to women, thereby promoting the advancement of women in this regar It also seeks to address the diverse land needs as expressed by communities for agricultural production, human settlements, commonage, residential and industrial developmen

src_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwekutfutfukisa Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe
trg_text: African Union (AU) Summit

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Loluhlakamsebenti Lwekutfutfukisa Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe lolutawuba ngumhlahlandlela kuwo onkhe ematiko ahulumende kute akhone kubhala tinchubomgomo taw Loluhlakamsebenti lufuna kufananisa tinchubo tekwakha tinchubomgomo kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumend Lombhalo uchaza tinyatselo letehlukahlukene lekufuneka tilandzelwe uma kwakhiwa tinchubomgomo tahulumende, lokufaka ekhatsi imijikeleto yekwakha tinchubomgomo, emazinga lalindzelekile; tintfo lekufuneka tibukwe uma kwakhiwa inchubomgomo kanye netintfo lekufanele tibekhona kute kwakhiwe kahle inchubomgomo netinchubo tekuyisebentis
trg_text: National Policy Development Framework Cabinet approved the National Policy Development Framework that will guide all government departments in drafting their respective public policie The framework seeks to standardise the policy-formulation processes across all spheres of governmen The document outlines the various steps to be followed in public policy formulation, which include policymaking cycles, expected standards; factors to be considered when formulating a policy and institutional arrangements to be put in place for effective policymaking and implementation processe

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lolukhona nyalo alucinisekisi kufanana nekusebentisana uma kwakhiwa inchubomgomo kuhulumend Lombhalo utawutfolakala kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko Letekuhlela, Kucaphela kanye Nekulinganisa (i-DPME) ku-wwdpmgoza 5.
trg_text: The current framework does not ensure uniformity and synergy in policymaking in governmen The document will be accessible through the Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation (DPME) website (wwdpmgoza).

src_text: Inchubomgomo Yeminikelo Yemhlaba Ikhabhinethi iyivumile inchubomgomo yekucala umsebenti, lohlose kuphutfumisa kunikela ngemhlaba njengalenye yetindlela tekuphendvula kusivinini lesincane setingucuko temhlab
trg_text: Land Donations Policy Cabinet approved the policy for implementation, which aims to accelerate land donations as one of the ways to respond to the slow pace of land refor

src_text: Kusetjentiswa kwalenchubomgomo kutawuvulela takhamuti letisetindzaweni letingasemadolobheni netasemakhaya ematfuba labonakalako kute tikhone kubamba lichaza kutemnotf Lenchubomgomo ibeka tikhutsati futsi ikhomba indlela yekunikela ngemhlaba lovela kulabo labanetindzawo letikhulu temhlab Letikhutsati tita netibopho letibekiwe tekunika emandla letibhekiswe kutikhungo letikhulu letitawunikela ngemhlab Umhlaba lonikeliwe netindlela tenchubomgomo yetikhutsati ticondzaniswe nesivumelwano lesatsatfwa balingani betenhlalo ngemnyaka we-2016 i-Operations Phakisa Kutekulima, Tingucuko Temhlaba Nekutfutfukisa Tindzawo Tasemakhay Lenchubomgomo yakhishwa kute ummango ucocisane ngayo ngeNdlovana 20206.
trg_text: The implementation of the policy will create meaningful opportunities for citizens in peri-urban and rural areas to participate in the econom It puts in place incentives and guides land donations by owners of large tracts of lan The incentives come with prescribed empowerment responsibilities on the part of big institutional land holders that will donate lan Donated land and the incentive policy measures are aligned to the agreement reached by social partners in the 2016 Operations Phakisa on Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Developmen The policy was released for public consultation in February 202 National Policy on Beneficiary Selection and Land Allocation of 2020 Cabinet approved the policy, which provides for a fair, credible and transparent process for beneficiary selection and land allocation in South Afric The policy incorporates comments received during its publication earlier in the year and sets out to address, amongst others, gender inequality in land ownershi

src_text: Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekukhetsa Labatawuzuza Nekunikwa Kwemhlaba Yemnyaka we-2020 Ikhabhinethi iyivumile lenchubomgomo, lebonelela kuba nenchubomgomo lengavuni hlangotsi, letsembekile nalevulekele wonkhe umuntfu yekukhetsa labatawuzuza nalabatawutfola umhlaba eNingizimu Afrik Lenchubomgomo ifaka tiphakamiso letatfolwa uma ishicilelwa ekucaleni kwemnyaka futsi ifuna kubukana, kulokunye, nekungalingani ngekwebulili kubunikati bemhlab Icalisa embili kunika bomake umhlaba, ngaloko igcugcutela kutfutfukisa bomake kulok Ifuna futsi kubukana naletidzingo letehlukahlukene njengoba tibekwe mimango lekhicita tekulima, yetekuhlaliswa kwebantfu, yebukhosi, yekutfutfukisa tindzawo tekuhlala netetimbon Lenchubomgomo ihlongota kutsi kwakhiwe umtimba lotimele lotawucubungula kunikwa kwemhlaba bese ibonelele kutsi kube neluhlelo lwe-inthanethi lwekufaka sicelo kute kucinisekiswe kutsi wonkhe umuntfu uyakubona kunikwa kwemhlab
trg_text: At a continental level, the policy contributes to the Presidential Infrastructure Champion Initiative, which advances interconnectivity amongst African countries to address infrastructure deficit and boost intra-Africa trad The draft policy will be gazetted for public comment during the first quarter of 202 Ratification of the International Labour Organisation Convention Concerning the Elimination of Violence and Harassment in the World of Work Convention of 2019 (N 190) Cabinet approved the submission of the World of Work Convention of 2019 (N 190) to Parliament for ratificatio The convention addresses violence and harassment, specifically in the workplac It provides a clear framework for action and an opportunity to shape a future of work based on dignity and respect, free from violence and harassmen Ratification of this convention is aligned to the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwemgomo Yendzawo Leyodvwa Yetemmincele (i-OSBP) Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi loluhlaka Lwenchubomgomo ye-OSBP kuyocociswana ngalo nemmang Lokwakhiwa kwe-OSBP kuhlose kuletsa kuvana kulokuhamba kwebantfu nemphahla emkhatsini kwemincele yekungena yelive yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye newemave lakhelene nay Letiphakamiso kulenchubomgomo tihlose kubukana nalokugcwala lokubanga kube nekubambeleleka, kakhulu tihambi nebahwebi labancamula kulemincel Lenchubomgomo icalisa kusebenta Koluhlakamsebenti Lwendzawo Leyodvwa Yemincele i-One-Stop Border Framework leyamukelwa yiKhabhinethi ngemnyaka we-2018.
trg_text: The AfCFTA holds enormous benefits for South Africa as it serves as a catalyst to economic growth and investmen The free-trade area opens our exports of goods and services to a market of more than 1,2 billion peopl As Chair of the AU, South Africa has been at the forefront of driving the implementation of the AfCFT The agreement advances economic integration and development, women empowerment on the continent, and strengthens efforts towards peace and stability in Africa Reconciliation Day South Africa will commemorate Reconciliation Day on 16 December 2020 under the theme:

src_text: Ezingeni lemavekati emhlaba, lenchubomgomo ifaka sandla kuloMklamo Welihhovisi Lamengameli Wekuba Livulandlela Lesakhiwonchanti i-Presidential Infrastructure Champion Initiative, lochubekisa kuchumana emkhatsini kwemave ase-Afrika kute kubukwe lokusalele emuva kwesakhiwonchanti futsi kukhuliswe kuhwebelana emaveni ase-Afrik Loluhlaka lwenchubomgomo lutawushicilelwa kute ummango ucocisane ngalo ekucaleni kwekota yekucala yemnyaka we-202 Kucinisekiswa Ngalokusemtsetfweni Ngesivumelwano Senhlangano Yetisebenti Yemave Emhlaba Lesimayelana Nekucedza Budlova Nekuhlukunyetwa Etindzaweni Tekusebenta
trg_text: The Department of Employment and Labour has already developed a Code of Good Practice on the Prevention and Elimination of Violence and Harassment in the World of Work Revised Antarctic and Southern Ocean Strategy Cabinet approved the revised strategy for implementation, which includes comments received during its publication earlier in the yea The strategy provides for the coordination and implementation of the Antarctic Treaties Act, 1996 (Act 60 of 1996), relating to research, conservation, sustainable resource use and environmental management in support of the African agend

src_text: Semnyaka We-2019 (Namba0).

Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile loko lokwetfulwe nguMhlangano Wemhlaba Wemsebenti wemnyaka we-2019 (Namb 190) kute kucinisekiswe yiPhalamend Lomhlangano ubuka tindzaba teludlame nekuhlukunyetwa, kakhulu emsebentin Lomhlangano uniketa luhlakamsebenti lolucacile lalokufuneka kwenteke nelitfuba lekwakha likusasa lemsebenti leligcile ekubeni nesitfunti nekuhlonipheka, lapho khona kungenaludlame nekuhlukunyetw Kucinisekiswa kwalesivumelwamo kuhambisana Nemtsetfosisekelo WaseRiphabhlikhi YaseNingizimu Afrika Yemnyaka We-1996.
trg_text: Preservation and Development of Agricultural Land Bill of 2020 Cabinet approved submission of the Bill to Parliamen The Bill repeals the Agricultural Land Act, 1970 (Act 70 of 1970) to give effect to constitutional requirements, and provide a fair and balanced approach in the use of agricultural lan The Bill proactively protects agricultural land for food production through the establishment of Protected Agricultural Areas in which high potential agricultural land will be delineated for agricultural purposes and low potential agricultural land will be permitted for non-agricultural use

src_text: Uma sewucinisekisiwe, tibonelelo talesivumelwano titawuba tetfu bese ticondzaniswa Nemtsetfo Wetindzaba Tetisebenti, Wemnyaka We-1995 (Umtsetfo We-66 Wemnyaka We-1995).
trg_text: Once ratified, the provisions of the convention will be domesticated and aligned to the Labour Relations Act, 1995 (Act 66 of 1995).

src_text: Litiko Letemisebenti Neletisebenti sevele lisungule Imigomo Yekwenta Kahle mayelana Nekuvimbela Nekucedza Ludlame Nekuhlukunyetwa Etindzaweni Temsebent 9.
